about_the_game:
●Story


After many years of work, I could now say I was able to live a fairly good life. However, I had no goals in life; I just went to work and got off work in an everyday cycle. One day, I took advantage of the alcohol and shouted out to the sky that I wanted a girlfriend—and then, there was actually a beautiful, young woman.

“I’m just a low-level succubus, so I can’t give you what you want. I haven’t even successfully enchanted any humans yet…”

So said Lilim, a self-proclaimed succubus. She said that, as a succubus, there was only one way to level up—and that was to get laid!
Having been single for a long time and feeling lonely, I agreed to take her in for a month, which made Lilim very happy. Looking at her cute smile made me feel a little bit of a stir in my heart. Well, undeniably also in my crotch. I couldn't help but look forward to what kind of an erotic life I would be able to lead later on.

What would become of my relationship with Lilim during these 30 days, and would she be able to succeed in her dream of becoming a high-level succubus?

●Gameplay instructions


This is a relaxing, daily life-style simulation game. Go to work to earn money, go on dates on the weekends, and interact with Lilim using a limited amount of daily action points.
You need to keep an eye on Lilim's [Satiety Level], feed her before she gets hungry and accumulate semen to raise her [Succubus Level], and raise her [Affection Level] and [Slut Level] through interactions. Lilim will react differently according to the values of these levels, which will also affect which ending you get.

If you reach certain endings, you will be able to start Endless Mode, meaning you will be able to continue interacting with Lilim after the 30-day period.

◆Game features


◇ Beautifully drawn, fully animated sex scenes
◇ Multiple outfits, so you can dress up Lilim according to your preference
◇ Depending on the values of her levels, Lilim will have different reactions and dialog
◇ Multiple endings

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.
All characters are over the age of 20.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: One night, a beautiful girl suddenly appeared in my room. She wasn’t just dressed in a revealing and sexy outfit, but she also had horns and a tail. Lilim, a self-proclaimed succubus, came to the human world in order to level up; my long-hoarded sexual desire was just the perfect target for her.
supported_languages:
Traditional Chinese, English, Simplified Chinese, Japanese*, Russian, Thai
*languages with full audio support
